A2,C4,E3,N3,O4: Odin seeks wisdom at any cost, trading eye and comfort for knowledge
Odin rules the Nine Realms while forever preparing for their end
Odin balances kingship with endless pursuit of understanding
A3,C3,E4,N2,O2: Thor brings thunder to every challenge with unshakeable confidence
Thor defends Midgard with hammer and heart in equal measure
Thor proves strength without wisdom eventually finds wisdom
A4,C4,E3,N3,O4: Frigg sees fate's threads and loves her family despite knowing their doom
Frigg holds Asgard together through wisdom and watchful care
Frigg carries the weight of foresight with graceful burden
A2,C2,E4,N4,O4: Loki weaves chaos through schemes born of wounded pride
Loki shifts shape and allegiance while searching for acceptance
Loki proves the trickster's path leads to unexpected places
A4,C4,E3,N2,O2: Tyr sacrificed his hand to bind chaos, knowing the cost beforehand
Tyr stands for justice and courage even when the price is high
Tyr proves that honor requires sacrifice
A4,C4,E4,N2,O3: Baldur shines as the brightest light in Asgard's hall
Baldur embodies hope that even gods desperately need
Baldur proves that goodness makes powerful enemies
A3,C4,E2,N2,O3: Heimdall watches the rainbow bridge with eyes that miss nothing
Heimdall guards the gates between worlds with eternal vigilance
Heimdall serves through patient observation and decisive action
A3,C3,E4,N3,O4: Freya commands beauty and war magic with equal skill
Freya chooses her fallen warriors and keeps her own counsel
Freya embodies passion that can build or destroy
A4,C4,E4,N2,O3: Freyr brings abundance and peace wherever he walks
Freyr gave up his sword for love and never regretted it
Freyr proves prosperity requires occasional sacrifice
A4,C3,E3,N2,O3: Njord calms the seas and blesses those who sail them
Njord brings wealth from waves with generous spirit
Njord bridges the gap between Vanir and Aesir with patient diplomacy
A2,C4,E2,N3,O3: Hel rules the quiet dead with distant fairness
Hel accepts all who come to her realm without judgment
Hel proves that death can be patient and just
A2,C4,E3,N3,O3: Skadi hunts the frozen mountains alone by choice
Skadi chose winter over marriage and found her peace
Skadi proves that solitude suits some souls better
A4,C4,E3,N2,O3: Idunn tends the golden apples that keep the gods young
Idunn nurtures eternal youth with quiet dedication
Idunn holds the key to Asgard's vitality in gentle hands
A4,C3,E4,N2,O4: Bragi sings tales that make heroes weep and warriors charge
Bragi transforms memory into poetry that outlasts the deed
Bragi proves words can strike as hard as any weapon
A2,C2,E4,N4,O2: Fenrir strains against chains that will eventually break
Fenrir embodies the rage that gods themselves fear
Fenrir waits for Ragnarok with terrible patience
A2,C3,E3,N4,O2: Jormungandr encircles the world and waits for the final battle
Jormungandr grows in the deep while fate approaches
Jormungandr proves some enemies cannot be killed, only delayed
A3,C4,E4,N2,O3: Valkyrie chooses the slain with warrior's eye for worth
Valkyrie carries heroes to halls they have earned
Valkyrie bridges battlefield and afterlife with purpose
A3,C4,E2,N2,O4: Norns weave fate that even gods cannot escape
Norns measure each thread of destiny with care
Norns prove that the future is fixed but not explained
A3,C4,E4,N2,O4: Huginn and Muninn bring Odin the world's secrets daily
Huginn and Muninn fly where no spy can follow
Huginn and Muninn prove that thought and memory serve wisdom
A4,C4,E4,N2,O3: Sleipnir carries Odin between worlds at impossible speed
Sleipnir proves that the strangest births create loyal companions
Sleipnir runs where no ordinary horse could follow
